Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.controller

Class MatchController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.controller.MatchController
public class MatchController extends Object
This class works as a proxy controller, delegating the job to the various other controllers. It also controls the computability of messages from clients, before calling the controllers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MatchController​(Player player)
    Specific constructor for single player matches with the standard configuration.

    Specific constructor for single player matches with a custom configuration.

    Standard configuration constructor: only players passed to the controller.
    MatchController​(List<Player> playersInMatch, MatchConfiguration configuration)
    Constructor that's specific for a custom configuration.

      Parameters:
      playersInMatch - the players
      configuration - the custom configuration
      Throws:
      RetryException - if configuration is not accepted

      Specific constructor for single player matches with the standard configuration.
      Parameters:
      player - the only player in match

    • MatchController

      public MatchController​(Player player, MatchConfiguration configuration) throws RetryException
      Specific constructor for single player matches with a custom configuration.
      Parameters:
      player - the only player in match
      configuration - the chosen configuration
      Throws:
      RetryException - for any wrong custom configuration's choice

    • startingLeader

      public boolean startingLeader​(String nickname, List<String> leaders) throws RetryException
      This method accepts the starting leaders' choices and sends the player to the StartingResource or StartingPhaseDone state.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player
      leaders - its leaders
      Returns:
      true if the operation went well
      Throws:
      RetryException - if isComputable goes wrong

    • nextTurn

      public boolean nextTurn​(String nickname) throws RetryException
      This method checks if the player is in end turn's phase and, eventually, passes to the next player's turn.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player that finished a turn
      Returns:
      true if the operation went well
      Throws:
      RetryException - if the player can't send this message in this phase

    • getKeyByValue

      public static <T,​ E> T getKeyByValue​(Map<T,​E> map, E value)
      This method gets the key that corresponds to a specific value in the map, if present.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the keys type
      E - the values type
      Parameters:
      map - the map
      value - the value
      Returns:
      true if ok, false elsewhere
